text:
Can I somehow get the url of a folder in HubL? like get_asset_url("../images/background.jpg") produces: <//f.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hubfs/0123456789/raw_assets/public/my_module/images/background.jpg>
and i want something like get_folder_url("../images") produces: <//f.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hubfs/0123456789/raw_assets/public/my_module/images>
